<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Gilded Gunner Goon](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1965)</title>

<traits>

<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 19</row>

**Perception** +8

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11, [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +1

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[black powder horn](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1190), [Chain Shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Flintlock Pistol](/Weapons.aspx?ID=192) (20 rounds)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 60

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
flintlock pistol +14 ([Concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [fatal d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [range 40 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   A Gilded Gunner goon's Strikes deal 1d6 additional precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
name: Gilded Gunner Goon
